about_the_game:
This DLC is already included in RPG Developer Bakin.
There is no need to download this DLC, as it will be duplicated.



Sound Pack Vol. 1 is a sound resource pack for RPG Developer Bakin that includes BGM, BGS (environmental sounds), ME, and SE (sound effects) in one package.

Contents Details
  • BGM: 67
  • BGS:47
  • ME:32
  • SE:402
detailed_description:
This DLC is already included in RPG Developer Bakin.
There is no need to download this DLC, as it will be duplicated.



Sound Pack Vol. 1 is a sound resource pack for RPG Developer Bakin that includes BGM, BGS (environmental sounds), ME, and SE (sound effects) in one package.

Contents Details

name: RPG Developer Bakin Sound Pack Vol.１

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphic board that works with OpenGL 4.4 or higher
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated environment.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Core i5-8400 / Ryzen 5 1500X or better
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX1650 AMD Radeon™ RX570
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated environment.
